DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research investigate clinical effect ESWT treatment shoulder neck pain .
DOC.detailed_description: Extracorporeal shock wave therapy ( ESWT ) use treat various musculoskeletal disorder . The beneficial effect ESWT include pain alleviation improvement local blood circulation . However , study explore effect ESWT subject shoulder neck pain .
DOC.criteria: Nonspecific shoulder neck pain Ages 20yr 45yr Shoulder neck syndrome upper trapezius levator scapulae 3 month No use medicine anodyne muscle relaxant .
DOC.keyword: Extracorporeal shock wave therapy ( ESWT ) , Neck Pain
